ship_behavior.name: default
ship_behavior.preferred_attack_range: median#max/min/median/12/412..	#this is the distance to target the ship wants to keep when attacking
ship_behavior.formation_distance: 10				#when orbing/following ship will try to keep this distance to assigned position
ship_behavior.return_to_formation_distance: 60	#when attacking the ship will switch to passive mode if distance to assigned position is greater that this
ship_behavior.collision_awareness: 0.75			#how much we try to avoid other ships
